info.task: navigate forwards to a switch in the on state
info.title: Navigate forwards to a switch in the on state

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeAndTurnOnSwitch
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the switch, and sets the state of the switch to 'on'

user: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Notifications' switch.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.
